name: Komperdell Carbon FXP.4 Summit Vario Poles - Unisex
description: Long summit approaches and multi-day treks call for light, fast poles. They're quick to deploy and adjustable to suit the terrain, thanks to the folding design and telescoping top section.Carbon construction keeps the weight way down.Lightweight Trek Pro Foam grips are comfortable in the hand.3 folding sections and an adjustable telescoping top segment for easy carrying. Solid connections make reassembly fast and easy.FlickLock Pro system allows fast, secure length adjustment.Tungsten carbid flex tip provides solid grip.
